MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L37 postcode area of Liverpool, affecting properties in Green Lane, Piercefield Road and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 5:54PM. Our engineers have arrived on site to investigate. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 9:00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:50PM on  23rd February 2021.
